dalserver.tap

Class ResultStoreImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.tap.ResultStoreImpl

  • public class ResultStoreImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic ResultStore implementation usable by the cadcTAP QueryRunner for async result storage. This implementation simply writes files to a local directory and then returns a URL to that file. The filesystem-to-URL mapping is configurable via two parameters passed via the service configuration.

    • baseStorageDir=/path/to/storage
    • baseURL=http://hostname/storage

      • setJob

        public void setJob(Job job)
        Set a reference to the UWS Job context.
        Parameters:
        job - Job instance The Job context is the primary mechanism for communicating context information to TAP class code. In particular, a reference to the DalContext for the query and service instance is stored in the Job descriptor, making it possible for DALServer TAP plugins to retrieve the DALServer context.
